metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6378 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Use after free in speech in Google Chrome prior to 79.0.3945.130 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Antti LevomÃ¤ki and Christian Jalio from Forcepoint

notes.Note: alexmurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
